channel.title: Custom Crowns moving from Playerrights
channel.description:
Before I start. Don't bitch on me ok
Now I followed [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,497390.msg3636991.html#msg3636991]this tutorial[/url] on how to add more icons to my Client
I got it to work and everything like that just it's through Playerrights
Now How do i make it so like I make it as the isDonator thing? Do I just put isDonator on there or what?
